channel.title: Football training, should i return?!?!?!?
channel.description:
sup guys,
Heres the story....
i go football training for a new club for the first time, and im tired as fuck after a few hours of football allready, g.c.s.e english catchup coursework , a sprinting session in p.e and walking home (an hour walk).
So anyway i get there and we start doing some intense track shit, and im like wdf. Im there for like 20 mins and im tired as fuck, can bearly breath and my legs where telling me to fuck off at the time. so i bassicly crawl off the pitch and just go home. And what makes it even worste is i only know one person there so its kinda embarissing if i go back cos i look like a pussy :(
anyway what do you guys think, the coach is ok i think but i dnno what the fuck to do, Help :)

item.title: Football training, should i return?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Geez, your blowing this in to something massive. I’m going to be blunt with you. Why does it matter? So you were tired one time and couldn’t carry on training. Who the fuck cares? Just get on with it, imho.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

If you’re stuffed from Soccer… Don’t try Rugby League/Union/Motocross any other sport… Please, don’t.

item.title: Football training, should i return?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

thx guys, ive decided i will go back and “Do what you want and fuck the rest”, if they say they dont want me there than fair enough. But this time im going hyped up on energy tablets and enegy drinks. Ill let you guys know how it goes (tuesday)

item.title: Football training, should i return?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“cant touch this93, post:10, topic:85840”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=125957.msg1227437#msg1227437 date=1177739100]

of course you will also look even more like a pussy if you quit

a kid i know was in the same situation as you and he quit…

he is now known as a “pussy”

That kid should stick up for himself.

So what if that kid or Solemn quits? People should do what they like, and not care what others think. It’s not like those people haven’t quit on something before.

Like Dancing, or Bale

You should do whatever you want to …
[/quote]

i like its spelled ballate…or something like that.

anyway stick with it. i ahd same situation with basketball camp. but it all turned out good[/quote]
It’s spelt Ballet.

Quote from Little Miss Sunshine:
Do what you want and fuck the rest.

Wise words.

item.title: Football training, should i return?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:3, topic:85840”]I think it is really up to you. There is the fitness benefit to sports but you also have to look at how it will benifit you in not only the short term but the long term.

I would stick with it for a little bit and see how it works out.[/quote]

I agree with Bebe. But, ultimately, the decision is yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Football training, should i return?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Are you trying out for a club team, or are you just playing in a local soccer league thats like 40 bucks for a season?
If you are really into it, soccer is the best sport you could ever play. It uses every muscle in your body, and there is no boring ‘innings’ or 30 minutes of a break between running from second to third base.

I would just recommend sticking it out for a little while longer, and try to get in shape.
You’ll enjoy it a whole lot more.

Read full topic

item.title: Football training, should i return?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

I think it is really up to you. There is the fitness benefit to sports but you also have to look at how it will benifit you in not only the short term but the long term.

I would stick with it for a little bit and see how it works out.

Read full topic
